title: Corps Commander Karachi witnesses troopsâ€™ training exercise in Salahpat, Rahim Yar Khan
content:
RAWALPINDI, Sep 25 (APP): Corps Commander Karachi Lieutenant General Humayun Aziz witnessed training exercise of troops in Salahpat and Rahim Yar Khan.
The troops from Karachi and Panu Aqil garrison participated in Field exercise, said an Inter Services Public Relations (ISPR) press release.
Corps Commander appreciated troops for their operational readiness and training standards .
